snippet: Nearly 16,000 residents remained without heat and hot water in public housing developments in Brooklyn and Queens on Wednesday.
abstract: New York City continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy, but nearly 16,000 residents in public housing developments in Brooklyn and Queens remain without heat and hot water; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 16,000 residents remained without heat and hot water in public housing developments in Brooklyn and Queens on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Updates to Service Restoration in New York City
